vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀντίγρᾰφ-ος, ον,
copied, in duplicate, στῆλυι, διαθῆκαι, etc., [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II as substantive, ἀντίγραφον, τό, transcript, copy, Canon Laws texts cited in [Refs 5th c.BC+]; especially of copies of a book, Ἀττικιανὰ ἀντίγραφα copies of an edition issued by Atticus, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; certified copy of official document, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; εἰκόνος ἀ. copy of a picture, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
